OOPSRequest.OntologyContent:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF xmlns="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#" xml:base="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:oboInOwl="http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#" xmlns:xml="http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#"> <owl:Ontology rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO"> <owl:versionIRI rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO"/> <!-- HACK: comment the following line to avoid OOPS WebService unexpected_issue --> <!-- <owl:imports rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/uo/releases/2018-05-20/uo.owl"/>--> <owl:versionInfo>1.0.0</owl:versionInfo> <rdfs:label>BBO</rdfs:label> <rdfs:label>BPMNbasedOntology</rdfs:label> <rdfs:comment>BBO is a business process ontology. The core element of BBO is a formalization of a BPMN 2.0 fragment (namely Chapter 10 of BPMN 2.0 specification). BPMN 2.0 is state-of-the-art meta-model of business processes.
Copyright © 2019 MELODI @ Toulouse Institute of Computer Science Research</rdfs:comment> <oboInOwl:created_by>Amina ANNANE, Nathalie Aussenac and Mouna Kamel</oboInOwl:created_by> </owl:Ontology>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Annotation properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#created_by -->
<owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#created_by"/>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Object Properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#belongs -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#belongs"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#groups"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Group"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#dependsOn -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#dependsOn"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:comment>If an Activity A dependsOn an Activity B, A can not start before completing B.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>dependsOn</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#describes -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#describes"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#WorkProcedureDocument"/> <rdfs:range> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:range> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#groups -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#groups"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Group"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_activationCondition -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_activationCondition"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_complexGateway"/> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexGateway"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Determines which combination of incoming tokens will be synchronized for activation of the Gateway.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_activationCondition</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_activity -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_activity"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">[IRIT]denotes the activity related to the source element</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_activity</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_activityRef -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_activityRef"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CompensateEventDefinition"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">For a Start Event: This Event “catches” the compensation for an Event Sub-Process. No further information is REQUIRED. The Event Sub-Process will provide the Id necessary to match the Compensation Event with the Event that threw the compensation, or the compensation will have been a broadcast. For an End Event: The Activity to be compensated MAY be supplied. If an Activity is not supplied, then the compensation is broadcast to all completed Activities in the current Sub- Process (if present), or the entire Process instance (if at the global level). For an Intermediate Event within normal flow: The Activity to be compensated MAY be supplied. If an Activity is not supplied, then the compensation is broadcast to all completed Activities in the current Sub- Process (if present), or the entire Process instance (if at the global level). This “throws” the compensation. For an Intermediate Event attached to the boundary of an Activity: This Event “catches” the compensation. No further information is REQUIRED. The Activity the Event is attached to will provide the Id necessary to match the Compensation Event with the Event that threw the compensation, or the compensation will have been a broadcast.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_activityRef</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_boundaryEventRef -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_boundaryEventRef"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_attachedToRef"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#BoundaryEvent"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This references the Intermediate Events that are attached to the boundary of the Activity.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_boundaryEventRef</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_callActivity -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_callActivity"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_calledElement"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallableElement"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallActivity"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_callableElement -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_callableElement"> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputBinding"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Interface"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallableElement"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_callableElement</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_calledElement -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_calledElement"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallActivity"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallableElement"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The element to be called, which will be either a Process or a GlobalTask.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_calledElement</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_completionCondition -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_completionCondition"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#AdHocSubProcess"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This attribute defines a boolean Expression that when evaluated to true, cancels the remaining Activity instances and produces a token.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_completionCondition</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_complexBehaviorDefinition -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_complexBehaviorDefinition"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexBehaviorDefinition"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_complexGateway -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_complexGateway"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexGateway"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">[IRIT] references the ComplexGateway which is concerned with the Expression</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_complexGateway</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_condition -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_condition"> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexBehaviorDefinition"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalEventDefinition"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:range> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FormalExpression"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:range> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This relation has two source concepts. The definition is related to the source concept: (1) conditionalEventDefinition: The Expression might be underspecified and provided in the form of natural language. For executable Processes (isExecutable = true), if the trigger is Conditional, then a FormalExpression MUST be entered. (2) complexBehaviorDefinition: This attribute defines a boolean Expression that when evaluated to true, cancels the remaining Activity instances and produces a token.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_condition</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_conditionExpression -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_conditionExpression"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_sequenceFlow"/> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An optional boolean Expression that acts as a gating condition. A token will only be placed on this Sequence Flow if this conditionExpression evaluates to true.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_conditionExpression</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_container -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_container"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_flowElements"/> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElement"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElementsContainer"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">[IRIT] this relation references the FlowElementContainer that includes the FlowElement</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_container</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_dataResourceInput -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_dataResourceInput"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ThrowEvent"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#DataResource"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_dataResourceOutput -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_dataResourceOutput"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CatchEvent"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#DataResource"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_default -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_default"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_defaultElement"/> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExclusiveGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InclusiveGateway"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The Sequence Flow that will receive a token when none of the conditionExpressions on other outgoing Sequence Flows evaluate to true. The default Sequence Flow should not have a conditionExpression. Any such Expression SHALL be ignored.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_default</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_defaultElement -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_defaultElement"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:range> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExclusiveGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InclusiveGateway"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:range> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_errorRef -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_errorRef"> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ErrorEventDefinition"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Operation"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Error"/> <rdfs:comment>for an ErrorEventDefinition instance: If the trigger is an Error, then an Error payload MAY be provided.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">for an Operation instance: specifies errors that the Operation may return. An Operation MAY refer to zero or more Error elements.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_errorRef</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_escalationRef -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_escalationRef"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EscalationEventDefinition"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Escalation"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">If the trigger is an Escalation, then an Escalation payload MAY be provided.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_escalationRef</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_event -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_event"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexBehaviorDefinition"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ImplicitThrowEvent"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinitionEvent"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Defines the event EventDefinitions that are triggers expected for a catch Event. These EventDefinitions are only valid inside the current Event. • If there is no EventDefinition defined, then this is considered a catch None Event and the Event will not have an internal marker (see Figure 10.91). • If there is more than one EventDefinition defined, this is considered a catch Multiple Event and the Event will have the pentagon internal marker (see Figure 10.90). This is an ordered set.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_eventDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinitionEvent -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinitionEvent"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_exclusiveGateway -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_exclusiveGateway"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExclusiveGateway"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">[IRIT] specifies the exclusive gateway referenced by the default sequence flow</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_exclusiveGateway</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_expression -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_expression"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The Expression that evaluates the value used to bind the ResourceParameter. (ResourceParameterBinding)</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_expression</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_flowElements -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_flowElements"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElementsContainer"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElement"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This association specifies the particular flow elements contained in a FlowElementContainer. Flow elements are Events, Gateways, Sequence Flows, Activities, Data Objects, Data Associations, and Choreography Activities.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_flowElements</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_inMessageRef -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_inMessageRef"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Operation"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Message"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_inclusiveGateway -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_inclusiveGateway"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InclusiveGateway"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">[IRIT] specifies the inclusive gateway referenced by the default sequence flow</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_inclusiveGateway</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>

<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_resourceOutputs"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputSpecification"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>

<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_resourceParameters -->

<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_sequenceFlow -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_sequenceFlow"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionExpression"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">[IRIT] specifies the SequenceFlow of the FlowNode</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_sequenceFlow</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>

<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_sourceRef -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_sourceRef"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The FlowNode that the Sequence Flow is connecting from. For a Choreography: Of the types of FlowNode, only Choreography Activities, Gateways, and Events can be the source.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_sourceRef</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>

<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_state"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceState"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>

<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_targetRef -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_targetRef"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The FlowNode that the Sequence Flow is connecting to. For a Process: Of the types of FlowNode, only Activities, Gateways, and Events can be the target. However, Activities that are Event Sub-Processes are not allowed to be a target. For a Choreography: Of the types of FlowNode, only Choreography Activities, Gateways, and Events can be the target.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_targetRef</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_timeCycle -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_timeCycle"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TimerEventDefinition"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <owl:propertyDisjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_timeDate"/> <owl:propertyDisjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_timeDuration"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">If the trigger is a Timer, then a timeCycle MAY be entered. Timer attributes are mutually exclusive and if any of the other Timer attributes is set, timeCycle MUST NOT be set (if the isExecutable attribute of the Process is set to true). The return type of the attribute timeCycle MUST conform to the ISO-8601 format for recurring time interval representations.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_timeCycle</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_timeDate -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_timeDate"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TimerEventDefinition"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <owl:propertyDisjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_timeDuration"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">If the trigger is a Timer, then a timeDate MAY be entered. Timer attributes are mutually exclusive and if any of the other Timer attributes is set, timeDate MUST NOT be set (if the isExecutable attribute of the Process is set to true). The return type of the attribute timeDate MUST conform to the ISO-8601 format for date and time representations.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_timeDate</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_timeDuration -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_timeDuration"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TimerEventDefinition"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">If the trigger is a Timer, then a timeDuration MAY be entered. Timer attributes are mutually exclusive and if any of the other Timer attributes is set, timeDuration MUST NOT be set (if the isExecutable attribute of the Process is set to true). The return type of the attribute timeDuration MUST conform to the ISO-8601 format for time interval representations.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has_timeDuration</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_unit -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_unit"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#UnitOfMeasure"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UO_0000000"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>

<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_unitOfMeasure"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#QuantitativeParameter"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#UnitOfMeasure"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_attachedToRef -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_attachedToRef"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#BoundaryEvent"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Denotes the Activity that boundary Event is attached to.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">attachedToRef</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_composedOf -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_composedOf"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#WorkProduct"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_installedOn -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_installedOn"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SoftwareResource"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Computer"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_leaderOf -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_leaderOf"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Group"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_partOf -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_partOf"/>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_responsibleFor -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_responsibleFor"> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Agent"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Role"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:range> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:range> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#plays -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#plays"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Agent"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Role"/> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#supports -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#supports"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Modelers can declare that they intend all executions or performances of one Process to also be valid for another Process. This means they expect all the executions or performances of the first Processes to also follow the steps laid out in the second Process.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">supports</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#takesPlaceAt -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#takesPlaceAt"> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ManufacturingFacility"/> <rdfs:comment>Allows to specifiy where the activity or the process will take place</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>takesPlaceAt</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Data properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#body -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#body"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FormalExpression"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The body of the Expression.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">body</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#cancelRemainingInstances -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#cancelRemainingInstances"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#AdHocSubProcess"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This attribute is used only if ordering is parallel. It determines whether running instances are cancelled when the completionCondition becomes true.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">cancelRemainingInstances</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#completionQuantity -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#completionQuantity"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This attribute defines the number of tokens that MUST be generated from the Activity. This number of tokens will be sent done any outgoing Sequence Flow (assuming any Sequence Flow conditions are satisfied). Note that any value for the attribute that is greater than 1 is an advanced type of modeling and should be used with caution.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">completionQuantity</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#createdOn -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#createdOn"/>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#errorCode -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#errorCode"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Error"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">For an End Event: If the result is an Error, then the errorCode MUST be supplied (if the processType attribute of the Process is set to executable) This “throws” the Error. For an Intermediate Event within normal flow: If the trigger is an Error, then the errorCode MUST be entered (if the processType attribute of the Process is set to executable). This “throws” the Error. For an Intermediate Event attached to the boundary of an Activity: If the trigger is an Error, then the errorCode MAY be entered. This Event “catches” the Error. If there is no errorCode, then any error SHALL trigger the Event. If there is an errorCode, then only an Error that matches the errorCode SHALL trigger the Event.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">errorCode</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#escalationCode -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#escalationCode"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Escalation"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">For an End Event: If the Result is an Escalation, then the escalationCode MUST be supplied (if the processType attribute of the Process is set to executable). This “throws” the Escalation. For an Intermediate Event within normal flow: If the trigger is an Escalation, then the escalationCode MUST be entered (if the processType attribute of the Process is set to executable). This “throws” the Escalation. For an Intermediate Event attached to the boundary of an Activity: If the trigger is an Escalation, then the escalationCode MAY be entered. This Event “catches” the Escalation. If there is no escalationCode, then any Escalation SHALL trigger the Event. If there is an escalationCode, then only an Escalation that matches the escalationCode SHALL trigger the Event.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">escalationCode</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#firstName -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#firstName"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#id -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#id"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This attribute is used to uniquely identify BPMN elements. The id is REQUIRED if this element is referenced or intended to be referenced by something else. If the element is not currently referenced and is never intended to be referenced, the id MAY be omitted.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">id</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#implementation -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#implementation"> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalBusinessRuleTask"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalUserTask"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ReceiveTask"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SendTask"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ServiceTask"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#UserTask"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This attribute specifies the technology that will be used to send and receive the Messages. Valid values are ##unspecified for leaving the implementation technology open, ##WebService for the Web service technology or a URI identifying any other technology or coordination protocol. A Web service is the default technology.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">implementation</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#instantiate -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#instantiate"> <rdfs:domain> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventBasedGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ReceiveTask"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:domain> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">When true, receipt of one of the Events will instantiate the Process instance.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">instantiate</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isClosed -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isClosed"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A boolean value specifying whether interactions, such as sending and receiving Messages and Events, not modeled in the Process can occur when the Process is executed or performed. If the value is true, they MAY NOT occur. If the value is false, they MAY occur.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">isClosed</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isExecutable -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isExecutable"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An optional Boolean value specifying whether the Process is executable. An executable Process is a private Process that has been modeled for the purpose of being executed according to the semantics of Chapter 14 (see page 426). Of course, during the development cycle of the Process, there will be stages where the Process does not have enough detail to be “executable.” A non-executable Process is a private Process that has been modeled for the purpose of documenting Process behavior at a modeler-defined level of detail. Thus, information needed for execution, such as formal condition expressions are typically not included in a non-executable Process. For public Processes, no value has the same semantics as if the value were false. The value MAY not be true for public Processes.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">isExecutable</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isForCompensation -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isForCompensation"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A flag that identifies whether this Activity is intended for the purposes of compensation. If false, then this Activity executes as a result of normal execution flow. If true, this Activity is only activated when a Compensation Event is detected and initiated under Compensation Event visibility scope (see page 281 for more information on scopes).</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">isForCompensation</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isImmediate -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isImmediate"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An optional boolean value specifying whether Activities or Choreography Activities not in the model containing the Sequence Flow can occur between the elements connected by the Sequence Flow. If the value is true, they MAY NOT occur. If the value is false, they MAY occur. Also see the isClosed attribute on Process, Choreography, and Collaboration. When the attribute has no value, the default semantics depends on the kind of model containing Sequence Flows: • For non-executable Processes (public Processes and non-executable private Processes) and Choreographies no value has the same semantics as if the value were false. • For an executable Processes no value has the same semantics as if the value were true. • For executable Processes, the attribute MUST NOT be false.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">isImmediate</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isRequired -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isRequired"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceParameter"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Specifies, if a parameter is optional or mandatory.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">isRequired</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isSequential -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isSequential"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This attribute is a flag that controls whether the Activity instances will execute sequentially or in parallel.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">isSequential</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#language -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#language"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FormalExpression"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Overrides the Expression language specified in the Definitions. The language MUST be specified in a URI format.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">language</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#lastName -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#lastName"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#loopMaximum -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#loopMaximum"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#StandardLoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Serves as a cap on the number of iterations.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">loopMaximum</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#maxValue -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#maxValue"/>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#method -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#method"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Transaction"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The method is an attribute that defines the Transaction method used to commit or cancel a Transaction. For executable Processes, it SHOULD be set to a technology specific URI, e.g., http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/10/wsat for WSAtomicTransaction, or http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-tx/wsba/2006/06/AtomicOutcome for WS-BusinessActivity.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">method</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#minValue -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#minValue"/>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The descriptive name of the element.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">name</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#parallelMultiple -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#parallelMultiple"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CatchEvent"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This attribute is only relevant when the catch Event has more than EventDefinition (Multiple). If this value is true, then all of the types of triggers that are listed in the catch Event MUST be triggered before the Process is instantiated.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">parallelMultiple</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#processType -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#processType"/>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#script -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#script"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ScriptTask"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The modeler MAY include a script that can be run when the Task is performed. If a script is not included, then the Task will act as the equivalent of an Abstract Task.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">script</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#scriptFormat -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#scriptFormat"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ScriptTask"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Defines the format of the script. This attribute value MUST be specified with a mime-type format. And it MUST be specified if a script is provided.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">scriptFormat</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#scriptLanguage -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#scriptLanguage"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalScriptTask"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en"></rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">scriptLanguage</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#startQuantity -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#startQuantity"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en"> This attribute defines the number of tokens that MUST arrive before the Activity can begin. Note that any value for the attribute that is greater than 1 is an advanced type of modeling and should be used with caution.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">startQuantity</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#state -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#state"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#testBefore -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#testBefore"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#StandardLoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Flag that controls whether the loop condition is evaluated at the beginning (testBefore = true) or at the end (testBefore = false) of the loop iteration.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">testBefore</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#type -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#type"> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#value -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#value"/>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#waitForCompletion -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#waitForCompletion"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CompensateEventDefinition"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">For a throw Compensation Event, this flag determines whether the throw Intermediate Event waits for the triggered compensation to complete (the default), or just triggers the compensation and immediately continues (the BPMN 1.2 behavior).</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">waitForCompletion</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>

<!-- http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UO_0000000 -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UO_0000000"/>
<!-- http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UO_0000046 -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UO_0000046"/>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Class> <owl:complementOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalSequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:complementOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_default"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_ioSpecification"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputSpecification"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_loopCharacteristics"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LoopCharacteristics"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#takesPlaceAt"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ManufacturingFacility"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Work that a company or organization performs using business processes. An activity can be atomic or non-atomic (compound). The types of activities that are a part of a Process Model are: Process, Sub-Process, and Task.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Activity</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#AdHocSubProcess -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#AdHocSubProcess"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SubProcess"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Class> <owl:complementOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_flowElements"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EndEvent"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#StartEvent"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:complementOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_flowElements"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_completionCondition"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An Ad-Hoc Sub-Process is a specialized type of Sub-Process that is a group of Activities that have no REQUIRED sequence relationships. A set of Activities can be defined for the Process, but the sequence and number of performances for the Activities is determined by the performers of the Activities.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">AdHocSubProcess</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Agent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Agent"> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Person or a Software that performs an activity</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>Agent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#AllMultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#AllMultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">All: no Event is ever thrown, a token is produced after completion of all instances. Any thrown Events can be caught by boundary Events on the Multi-Instance Activity.</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#BoundaryEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#BoundaryEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CatchEvent"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_attachedToRef"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#BusinessRuleTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#BusinessRuleTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Task"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Business Rule Task provides a mechanism for the Process to provide input to a Business Rules Engine and to get the output of calculations that the Business Rules Engine might provide. The InputOutputSpecification of the Task (see page 211) will allow the Process to send data to and receive data from the Business Rules Engine.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">BusinessRuleTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallActivity -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallActivity"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_calledElement"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallableElement"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Call Activity identifies a point in the Process where a global Process or a Global Task is used. The Call Activity acts as a ‘wrapper’ for the invocation of a global Process or Global Task within the execution. The activation of a call Activity results in the transfer of control to the called global Process or Global Task.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">CallActivity</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallableElement -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallableElement"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_ioSpecification"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputSpecification"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">CallableElement is the abstract super class of all Activities that have been defined outside of a Process or Choreography but which can be called (or reused), by a Call Activity, from within a Process or Choreography. It MAY reference Interfaces that define the service operations that it provides. The BPMN elements that can be called by Call Activities (i.e., are CallableElements) are: Process and GlobalTask (see Figure 10.43).</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">CallableElement</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CancelEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CancelEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CancelEventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateCatchEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateThrowEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonInterruptingBoundaryEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonInterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ProcessStartEvent"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CancelEventDefinition -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CancelEventDefinition"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Cancel Events are only used in the context of modeling Transaction Sub-Processes (see page 178 for more details on Transactions). There are two variations: a catch Intermediate Event and an End Event.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">CancelEventDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CatchEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CatchEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Events that catch a trigger. All Start Events and some Intermediate Events are catching Events.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">CatchEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Cell -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Cell"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ManufacturingFacility"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_partOf"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Shop"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Cell</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CompensateEventDefinition -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CompensateEventDefinition"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_activityRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Compensation Events are used in the context of triggering or handling compensation (see page 302 for more details on compensation). There are four variations: a Start Event, both a catch and throw Intermediate Event, and an End Event.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">CompensateEventDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CompensationEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CompensationEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CompensateEventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateCatchEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonInterruptingBoundaryEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonInterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ProcessStartEvent"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexBehaviorDefinition -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexBehaviorDefinition"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_condition"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FormalExpression"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_event"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ImplicitThrowEvent"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This element controls when and which Events are thrown in case behavior of the Multi-Instance Activity is set to complex.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ComplexBehaviorDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexGateway -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexGateway"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_activationCondition"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_default"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The Complex Gateway can be used to model complex synchronization behavior. An Expression activationCondition is used to describe the precise behavior. For example, this Expression could specify that tokens on three out of five incoming Sequence Flows are needed to activate the Gateway. What tokens are produced by the Gateway is determined by conditions on the outgoing Sequence Flows as in the split behavior of the Inclusive Gateway. If tokens arrive later on the two remaining Sequence Flows, those tokens cause a reset of the Gateway and new token can be produced on the outgoing Sequence Flows. To determine whether it needs to wait for additional tokens before it can reset, the Gateway uses the synchronization semantics of the Inclusive Gateway.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ComplexGateway</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexMultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexMultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Complex: the complexBehaviorDefinitions are consulted to determine if and which Events to throw. Any thrown Events can be caught by boundary Events on the Multi-Instance Activity.</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Component -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Component"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MaterialResource"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Component</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Computer"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MaterialResource"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Computer</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalEventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EndEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateThrowEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> </owl:Class>
