<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalEventDefinition"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_condition"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ConditionalEventDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalSequenceFlow -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalSequenceFlow"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_conditionExpression"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#DefaultSequenceFlow"/> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConvergingGateway"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_incoming"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">2</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Database"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#DataResource"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Database</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#DefaultSequenceFlow -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#DefaultSequenceFlow"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_defaultElement"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExclusiveGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InclusiveGateway"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:onClass> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Device"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MaterialResource"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Device</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#DocumentResource -->

<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EndEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EndEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ThrowEvent"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Class> <owl:complementOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:complementOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_incoming"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelMultipleEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TimerEvent"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">As the name implies, the End Event indicates where a Process will end. In terms of Sequence Flows, the End Event ends the flow of the Process, and thus, will not have any outgoing Sequence Flows—no Sequence Flow can connect from an End Event.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">EndEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EquipmentDraw -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EquipmentDraw"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TechnicalDocument"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Type of technical documentation containing the design information of a material resource.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">EquipmentDraw</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Error -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Error"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An Error represents the content of an Error Event or the Fault of a failed Operation. An ItemDefinition is used to specify the structure of the Error. An Error is generated when there is a critical problem in the processing of an Activity or when the execution of an Operation failed.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Error</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ErrorEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ErrorEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ErrorEventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateCatchEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateThrowEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonInterruptingBoundaryEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonInterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ProcessStartEvent"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ErrorEventDefinition -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ErrorEventDefinition"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_errorRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Error"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ErrorEventDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Escalation -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Escalation"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An Escalation identifies a business situation that a Process might need to react to. An ItemDefinition is used to specify the structure of the Escalation.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Escalation</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EscalationEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EscalationEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EscalationEventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateCatchEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ProcessStartEvent"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EscalationEventDefinition -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EscalationEventDefinition"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_escalationRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Escalation"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">EscalationEventDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An Event is something that “happens” during the course of a Process. These Events affect the flow of the Process and usually have a cause or an impact and in general require or allow for a reaction. The term “event” is general enough to cover many things in a Process. The start of an Activity, the end of an Activity, the change of state of a document, a Message that arrives, etc., all could be considered Events.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Event</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventBasedGateway -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventBasedGateway"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Class> <owl:complementOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalSequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:complementOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">2</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The Event-Based Gateway represents a branching point in the Process where the alternative paths that follow the Gateway are based on Events that occur, rather than the evaluation of Expressions using Process data (as with an Exclusive or Inclusive Gateway). A specific Event, usually the receipt of a Message, determines the path that will be taken. Basically, the decision is made by another Participant, based on data that is not visible to Process, thus, requiring the use of the Event-Based Gateway.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">EventBasedGateway</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinitionEvent"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Event Definitions refers to the triggers of Catch Events (Start and receive Intermediate Events) and the Results of Throw Events (End Events and send Intermediate Events). The types of Event Definitions are: CancelEventDefinition, CompensationEventDefinition, ConditionalEventDefinition ErrorEventDefinition, EscalationEventDefinition, MessageEventDefinitio, LinkEventDefinition, SignalEventDefinition, TerminateEventDefinition, an TimerEventDefinition (see Table 10.93). A None Event is determined by an Event that does not specify an Event Definition. A Multiple Event is determined by an Event that specifies more than one Event Definition. The different types of Events (Start, End, and Intermediate) utilize a subset of the available types of Event Definitions.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">EventDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventSubProcess -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventSubProcess"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SubProcess"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_incoming"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_flowElements"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventSubProcessStartEvent"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment>EventBasedSubProcess</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventSubProcessStartEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventSubProcessStartEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CompensateEventDefinition"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalEventDefinition"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ErrorEventDefinition"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EscalationEventDefinition"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MessageEventDefinition"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SignalEventDefinition"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SubProcessStartEvent"/> <rdfs:comment>The StartEvent of an EventBasedSubProcess</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>EventSubProcessStartEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExclusiveEventBasedGateway -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExclusiveEventBasedGateway"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventBasedGateway"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExclusiveGateway -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExclusiveGateway"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_default"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A diverging Exclusive Gateway (Decision) is used to create alternative paths within a Process flow. This is basically the “diversion point in the road” for a Process. For a given instance of the Process, only one of the paths can be taken.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ExclusiveGateway</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExecutablePrivateProcess -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExecutablePrivateProcess"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#PrivateProcess"/> <rdfs:label>ExecutableBusinessProcess</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExecutableScript -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExecutableScript"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#DocumentResource"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ExecutableScript</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_complexGateway"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexGateway"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The Expression class is used to specify an Expression using natural-language text. These Expressions are not executable. The natural language text is captured using the documentation attribute, inherited from BaseElement.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Expression</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Factory -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Factory"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ManufacturingFacility"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#is_partOf"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Enterprise"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Factory</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElement -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElement"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_container"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElementsContainer"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">FlowElement is the abstract super class for all elements that can appear in a Process flow, which are FlowNodes (see page 99, which consist of Activities (see page 151), Choreography Activities (see page 321) Gateways (see page 287), and Events (see page 233), Data Objects (see page 205), Data Associations (see page 221), and Sequence Flows (see page 97).</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">FlowElement</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElementsContainer -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElementsContainer"> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">FlowElementsContainer</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElement"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The FlowNode element is used to provide a single element as the source and target Sequence Flow associations (see Figure 8.35) instead of the individual associations of the elements that can connect to Sequence Flows (see the section above). Only the Gateway, Activity, Choreography Activity, and Event elements can connect to Sequence Flows and thus, these elements are the only ones that are sub-classes of FlowNode.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">FlowNode</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FormalExpression -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FormalExpression"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#language"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The FormalExpression class is used to specify an executable Expression using a specified Expression language. A natural-language description of the Expression can also be specified, in addition to the formal specification.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">FormalExpression</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_incoming"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">2</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">2</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Gateways are used to control how Sequence Flows interact as they converge and diverge within a Process. If the flow does not need to be controlled, then a Gateway is not needed. The term “Gateway” implies that there is a gating mechanism that either allows or disallows passage through the Gateway--that is, as tokens arrive at a Gateway, they can be merged together on input and/or split apart on output as the Gateway mechanisms are invoked.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Gateway</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalBusinessRuleTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalBusinessRuleTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalTask"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">GlobalBusinessRuleTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalManualTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalManualTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalTask"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">GlobalManualTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalScriptTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalScriptTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalTask"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">GlobalScriptTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallableElement"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Global Task is a reusable, atomic Task definition that can be called from within any Process by a Call Activity.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">GlobalTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalUserTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalUserTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalTask"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">GlobalUserTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Group -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Group"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#HumanResource"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#groups"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">2</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_leader"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The Group class represents a collection of individual agents (and may itself play the role of a Agent, ie. something that can perform actions). [Definition extracted from FOAF Vocabulary Specification 0.99]</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Group</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#HumanResource -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#HumanResource"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Agent"/> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#WorkProduct"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Human agents contributing to the execution of business processes.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">HumanResource</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ImplicitThrowEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ImplicitThrowEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ThrowEvent"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A sub-type of throw Event is the ImplicitThrowEvent. This is a non-graphical Event that is used for Multi-Instance Activities (see page 191).</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ImplicitThrowEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InclusiveGateway -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InclusiveGateway"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_default"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A diverging Inclusive Gateway (Inclusive Decision) can be used to create alternative but also parallel paths within a Process flow. Unlike the Exclusive Gateway, all condition Expressions are evaluated. The true evaluation of one condition Expression does not exclude the evaluation of other condition Expressions. All Sequence Flows with a true evaluation will be traversed by a token. Since each path is considered to be independent, all combinations of the paths MAY be taken, from zero to all. However, it should be designed so that at least one path is taken.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">InclusiveGateway</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputBinding -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputBinding"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_inputResourceRef"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_operationRef"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Operation"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outputResourceRef"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_callableElement"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallableElement"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">When a CallableElement is exposed as a Service, it has to define one or more InputOutputBinding elements. An InputOutputBinding element binds one Input and one Output of the InputOutputSpecification to an Operation of a Service Interface.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">InputOutputBinding</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputSpecification -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputSpecification"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_inputSet"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputSet"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outputSet"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#OutputSet"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_activity"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">InputOutputSpecification</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputSet -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputSet"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_ioSpecification"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputSpecification"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An InputSet is a collection of Resource elements that together define a valid set of Resources for an InputOutputSpecification. An InputOutputSpecification MUST have at least one InputSet element. An InputSet MAY reference zero or more Resource elements. A single Resource MAY be associated with multiple InputSet elements, but it MUST always be referenced by at least one InputSet.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">InputSet</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Interface -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Interface"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_interfaceOperation"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Operation"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An interface defines a set of operations that are implemented by Services.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Interface</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateCatchEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateCatchEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CatchEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NoneEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TerminateEvent"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Message Intermediate Event can be used to either send a Message or receive a Message. When used to “catch” the Message, then the Event marker MUST be unfilled (see the lower figure on the right).</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">IntermediateCatchEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#BoundaryEvent"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateCatchEvent"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateThrowEvent"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment>The Intermediate Event indicates where something happens (an Event) somewhere between the start and end of a Process. It will affect the flow of the Process, but will not start or (directly) terminate the process.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>IntermediateEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateThrowEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#IntermediateThrowEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ThrowEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelMultipleEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TerminateEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TimerEvent"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Message Intermediate Event can be used to either send a Message or receive a Message.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">IntermediateThrowEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InterruptingBoundaryEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InterruptingBoundaryEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#BoundaryEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NoneEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TerminateEvent"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">the Activity attached to this event should be cancelled</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NoneEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TerminateEvent"/> <rdfs:label>InterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Job -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Job"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_superiorJob"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Job"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:label>Job</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonInterruptingBoundaryEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonInterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ProcessStartEvent"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEventDefinition -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEventDefinition"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_source"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_target"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LinkEventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Link Event is a mechanism for connecting two sections of a Process. Link Events can be used to create looping situations or to avoid long Sequence Flow lines. The use of Link Events is limited to a single Process level (i.e., they cannot link a parent Process with a Sub-Process).</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">LinkEventDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LoopCharacteristics -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LoopCharacteristics"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_loopActivity"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Activities MAY be repeated sequentially, essentially behaving like a loop. The presence of LoopCharacteristics signifies that the Activity has looping behavior. LoopCharacteristics is an abstract class. Concrete subclasses define specific kinds of looping behavior.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">LoopCharacteristics</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ManualTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ManualTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Task"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Manual Task is a Task that is expected to be performed without the aid of any business process execution engine or any application. An example of this could be a telephone technician installing a telephone at a customer location.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ManualTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ManufacturingFacility -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ManufacturingFacility"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ManufacturingFacility</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MaterialResource -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MaterialResource"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">a physical resource</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">MaterialResource</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Message -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Message"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Message represents the content of a communication between two Participants. In BPMN 2.0, a Message is a graphical decorator (it was a supporting element in BPMN 1.2). An ItemDefinition is used to specify the Message structure.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Message</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MessageEventDefinition -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MessageEventDefinition"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_messageRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Message"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_operationRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Operation"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">MessageEventDefinition</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MixedGateway -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MixedGateway"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_incoming"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">2</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">2</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Gateway"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_completionCondition"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_inputResourceItem"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_loopCardinality"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_loopResourceInputRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceCollection"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_loopResourceOutputRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceCollection"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_noneBehaviorEventRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_oneBehaviorEventRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outputResourceItem"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics class allows for creation of a desired number of Activity instances. The instances MAY execute in parallel or MAY be sequential. Either an Expression is used to specify or calculate the desired number of instances or a data driven setup can be used. In that case a data input can be specified, which is able to handle a collection of data. The number of items in the collection determines the number of Activity instances. This data input can be produced by an input Data Association. The modeler can also configure this loop to control the tokens produced.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultipleEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">2</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonEventSubProcessStartEvent"/> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonExecutableBusinessProcess"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#PrivateProcess"/> <rdfs:label>NonExecutableBusinessProcess</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NonInterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventSubProcessStartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NoneEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TerminateEvent"/> <rdfs:label>InterruptingEventSubProcessStartEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NoneEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NoneEvent"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <owl:Class> <owl:complementOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_eventDefinition"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventDefinition"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:complementOf> </owl:Class> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NoneMultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NoneMultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">None: the EventDefinition which is associated through the noneEvent association will be thrown for each instance completing. Any thrown Events can be caught by boundary Events on the Multi-Instance Activity.</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NormalSequenceFlow -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#NormalSequenceFlow"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <owl:Class> <owl:complementOf> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ConditionalSequenceFlow"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#DefaultSequenceFlow"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:complementOf> </owl:Class> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#OneMultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#OneMultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultiInstanceLoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">One: the EventDefinition referenced through the oneEvent association will be thrown upon the first instance completing. Any thrown Events can be caught by boundary Events on the Multi-Instance Activity.</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Operation -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Operation"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_inMessageRef"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Message"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_operationInterface"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Interface"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outMessageRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Message"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An Operation defines Messages that are consumed and, optionally, produced when the Operation is called. It can also define zero or more errors that are returned when operation fails. The Operation inherits the attributes and model associations of BaseElement</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Operation</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#OutputSet -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#OutputSet"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_ioSpecification"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputOutputSpecification"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An OutputSet is a collection of Resource elements that together can be produced as output from an Activity or Event. An InputOutputSpecification element MUST define at least OutputSet element. An OutputSet MAY reference zero or more Resource elements. A single Resource output MAY be associated with multiple OutputSet elements, but it MUST always be referenced by at least one OutputSet.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">OutputSet</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelAdHocSubProcess -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelAdHocSubProcess"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#AdHocSubProcess"/> <rdfs:comment>all the Activities of the Sub-Process can be performed in parallel</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>ParallelAdHocSubProcess</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelEventBasedGateway -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelEventBasedGateway"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventBasedGateway"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelGateway -->

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelMultipleEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#MultipleEvent"/> <rdfs:comment>all of the types of EventDefinition that are listed in the Event MUST be triggered.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>ParallelMultipleEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Parameter"> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A specific characteristic of an object that may have different values</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>Parameter</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParameterExpectedValue -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParameterExpectedValue"> <rdfs:label>ParameterExpectedValue</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParameterValue"> <rdfs:label>ParameterValue</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
