<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParameterValueBinding"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_parameter"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Parameter"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_parameterExpectedValue"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParameterExpectedValue"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_parameterValue"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParameterValue"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An abstract class that binds a parameter to its value, and eventually its expected value.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>ParameterValueBinding</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Person"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#HumanResource"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Human individual</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Person</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#PrivateProcess -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#PrivateProcess"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> <rdfs:comment>A process that is internal to a specific organization and is the type of process that has been generally called a workflow or BPM process.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>PrivateProcess</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CallableElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElementsContainer"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#takesPlaceAt"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ManufacturingFacility"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A sequence or flow of Activities in an organization with the objective of carrying out work. In BPMN, a Process is depicted as a graph of Flow Elements, which are a set of Activities, Events, Gateways, and Sequence Flow that adhere to a finite execution semantics.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Process</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ProcessStartEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ProcessStartEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#StartEvent"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TerminateEvent"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Property -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Property"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_propertyElement"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:onClass> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Modeler-defined properties MAY be added to a Process. These properties are contained within the Process. All Tasks and Sub-Processes SHALL have access to these properties.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Property</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#PublicProcess -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#PublicProcess"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Process"/> <rdfs:label>PublicProcess</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#QualitativeParameter -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#QualitativeParameter"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Parameter"/> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#QuantitativeParameter"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">parameters that have only qualitative values</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">QualitativeParameter</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#QuantitativeParameter -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#QuantitativeParameter"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Parameter"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_unitOfMeasure"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#UnitOfMeasure"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">parameters that have only quantitative values</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">QuantitativeParameter</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ReceiveTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ReceiveTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Task"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_messageRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Message"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_operationRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Operation"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Receive Task is a simple Task that is designed to wait for a Message to arrive from an external Participant (relative to the Process). Once the Message has been received, the Task is completed.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ReceiveTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Rendering -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Rendering"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_renderingTask"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#GlobalUserTask"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#UserTask"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:onClass> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:label>Rendering</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The Resource class is used to specify resources that can be referenced by Activities. These Resources can be Human Resources as well as any other resource assigned to Activities during Process execution time. The definition of a Resource is “abstract,” because it only defines the Resource, without detailing how e.g., actual user IDs are associated at runtime. Multiple Activities can utilize the same Resource.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Resource</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceCollection -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceCollection"> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An abstract class that groups a set of resources</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>ResourceCollection</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceParameter -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceParameter"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Parameter"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_resource"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Resource"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A parameter related to a specific resource, only one resource</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ResourceParameter</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceState -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ResourceState"> <rdfs:label>ResourceState</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Role -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Role"> <rdfs:label>Role</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement"> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">RootElement is the abstract super class for all BPMN elements that are contained within Definitions. When contained within Definitions, these elements have their own defined life-cycle and are not deleted with the deletion of other elements. Examples of concrete RootElements include Collaboration, Process, and Choreography. Depending on their use, RootElements can be referenced by multiple other elements (i.e., they can be reused). Some RootElements MAY be contained within other elements instead of Definitions. This is done to avoid the maintenance overhead of an independent life-cycle. For example, an EventDefinition would be contained in a Process since it is used only there. In this case the EventDefinition would be dependent on the tool life-cycle of the Process.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">RootElement</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Scheme -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Scheme"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TechnicalDocument"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">/</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Scheme</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ScriptTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ScriptTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Task"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#script"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#scriptFormat"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Script Task is executed by a business process engine. The modeler or implementer defines a script in a language that the engine can interpret. When the Task is ready to start, the engine will execute the script. When the script is completed, the Task will also be completed.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ScriptTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SendTask -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SendTask"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Task"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_messageRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Message"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_operationRef"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Operation"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A Send Task is a simple Task that is designed to send a Message to an external Participant (relative to the Process). Once the Message has been sent, the Task is completed.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">SendTask</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Class> <owl:complementOf> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_conditionExpression"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_sourceRef"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventBasedGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelGateway"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:complementOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_sourceRef"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_targetRef"/> <owl:qualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:qualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#FlowNode"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_conditionExpression"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_defaultElement"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Activity"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ComplexGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ExclusiveGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InclusiveGateway"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:onClass> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#isImmediate"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A connecting object that shows the order in which activities are performed in a Process and is represented with a solid graphical line. Each Flow has only one source and only one target. A Sequence Flow can cross the boundaries between Lanes of a Pool but cannot cross the boundaries of a Pool.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">SequenceFlow</rdfs:label> </owl:Class> <owl:Axiom> <owl:annotatedSource rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> <owl:annotatedProperty rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#subClassOf"/> <owl:annotatedTarget> <owl:Class> <owl:complementOf> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_conditionExpression"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_sourceRef"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#EventBasedGateway"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ParallelGateway"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:complementOf> </owl:Class> </owl:annotatedTarget> <rdfs:comment>A source Gateway MUST NOT be of type Parallel or Event (for a conditional sequence flow) (p.97)
We have added this restriction to the SequenceFlow class rather than the ConditionalSequenceFlow class to state that it is inconsistent to have a SequenceFlow which is at the same time Conditional and has parallel or eventbased gateway source. Otherwise, it would be possible to have such a SequenceFlow classified as a NormalSequenceFlow.</rdfs:comment> </owl:Axiom>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequentialAdHocSubProcess -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequentialAdHocSubProcess"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#AdHocSubProcess"/> <rdfs:comment>only one Activity can be performed at a time</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>SequentialAdHocSubProcess</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ServiceTask -->

<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Signal"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#RootElement"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#name"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A BPMN Signal is similar to a signal flare that shot into the sky for anyone who might be interested to notice and then react. <!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#StandardLoopCharacteristics -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#StandardLoopCharacteristics"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#LoopCharacteristics"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_loopCondition"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Expression"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#loopMaximum"/> <owl:maxQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:maxQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onDataRange rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The StandardLoopCharacteristics class defines looping behavior based on a boolean condition. The Activity will loop as long as the boolean condition is true. The condition is evaluated for every loop iteration, and MAY be evaluated at the beginning or at the end of the iteration. In addition, a numeric cap can be optionally specified. The number of iterations MAY NOT exceed this cap.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">StandardLoopCharacteristics</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#StartEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#StartEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#CatchEvent"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Class> <owl:complementOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_incoming"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:complementOf> </owl:Class> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_outgoing"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#SequenceFlow"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">As the name implies, the Start Event indicates where a particular Process will start. In terms of Sequence Flows, the Start Event starts the flow of the Process, and thus, will not have any incoming Sequence Flows—no Sequence Flow can connect to a Start Event. flow of the Process and does not have any incoming Sequence Flow, but can have a Trigger. The Start Event is displayed as a circle, drawn with a single thin line.</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">StartEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

A Task is used when the work in the Process is not broken down to a finer level of Process Model detail. Generally, an end-user, an application, or both will perform the Task. <!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ThrowEvent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#ThrowEvent"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#Event"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#has_inputSet"/> <owl:minQualifiedCardinality rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#nonNegativeInteger">1</owl:minQualifiedCardinality> <owl:onClass rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#InputSet"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">Events that throw a Result. All End Events and some Intermediate Events are throwing Events that MAY eventually be caught by another Event. Typically the trigger carries information out of the scope where the throw Event occurred into the scope of the catching Events. The throwing of a trigger MAY be either implicit as defined by this standard or an extension to it or explicit by a throw Event</rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">ThrowEvent</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<!-- https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#UserManual -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#UserManual"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="https://www.irit.fr/recherches/MELODI/ontologies/BBO#TechnicalDocument"/> <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A user guide intended to give assistance to people using a particular system.
